TopicTitle: Inclination information in trajectories and just in general.

Articles.Content:
What would really be nice is to have your craft's inclination listed somewhere in the UI. Currently, the only way to really have any idea of what your inclination is to either guestimate or know off hand what your targets inclination is and go off of the ascending/descending node differences.

And it would be *extremely* helpful to have it listed on your trajectory, alongside your apo/periapsis. That would make choosing the right trajectory a bit easier for those that want or need to enter into the SOI at a specific inclination.
I agree, there could be more information like this on your craft.
Using KER and MJ, yeah, that information is indispensable

Give a mouse inclination, and he will ask for longitude of the ascending node. Give a mouse longitude of the ascending node, and he will ask for argument of the periapsis. Give a mouse argument of the periapsis...
Information like this would be ideal for pilot and/or engineer skills. Display the data only when the appropriate skill level is present.
